items.title: Figma bets on India to expand beyond design
items.description: Figma has opened a new office in Bengaluru as part of a push to deepen its India ties and appeal to more developers.

items.title: The global race for the AI app layer is still on
items.description: The U.S. is far ahead of Europe in the race for large AI models, at least in funding. But the picture is different for the application layer, global V...

items.title: Red Bull Racing’s secret weapon? An engineer who treats workflows like lap times
items.description: Lauren Mekies spent much of his career in the engineering trenches. His approach to winning reflects that technical background, too.

items.title: SoftBank’s Nvidia sale rattles market, raises questions
items.description: Wall Street can’t help but wonder: does Son see something right now that others do not?

items.title: Google Pixel update adds battery-saving maps mode, AI photo remixing, and smarter notifications
items.description: Google says the new power saving mode for Google Maps can save you up to four hours of battery life
